column1: #text=I was going to make dinner on Sunday , so I needed to go grocery shopping .
#text=I made a list of all the items I needed .
#text=I got in my car and drove to the grocery store .
#text=I entered the store and got a shopping cart to put all of my food items inside .
#text=I got out my list and found all the items I needed and put them in my cart .
#text=When I was done getting everything I stood in line to check out .
#text=I put my food on the conveyor belt and the cashier rung up my items .
#text=She told me the total cost of all of the items .
#text=I got out my wallet and took out the appropriate money and paid the bill .
#text=The bag boy put all of my bags into my shopping cart .
#text=I left the store and unloaded all of my goods into the trunk of my car and drove home .
